alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 2:30PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph later Friday night through Sunday. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow densities are expected to increase beginning Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
